name: Himanshu Singh
summary: Proficient and creative WordPress developer with a strong knowledge in Custom Wordpress theme and plugin development. Experienced in creating Ecommerce, Donation and Listing Platform websites from scratch using latest technologies. Expert in all aspects of WordPress website creation, including design, plugins, customization and implementation.
skills: WordPress Custom Theme Development from scratch
Extensive experience to create WordPress Elementor Theme, WP Bakery Theme with additional option panel using Redux Framework
Experience to create custom Elements/Shortcodes using WP Bakery and Elementor Plugins with advanced level features
Build high quality Themes and E-Commerce Portals for the client and marketplaces (Themeforest/Templatemonster) and developed fully backend functionalities with additional plugin compatibility
Experience in UI/UX designing using HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, jQuery
Ability to create Ajax functionalities like Search form, Login/Register form, Pagination and more
Custom widgets for custom post types and other website features
Experience to create WordPress products for marketplaces like Themeforest & Templatemonster
Created WordPress themes in Donations, Hotel Booking, Ecommerce and Listings categories
Ability to build solutions that cater for cross-platform and cross-browser differences and debugging site issues
Ability to create Multisite website product
Knowledge of Object Oriented Programming with custom plugin development in PHP and MySQL
Ability to integrate and customize third party plugins into website
